description: "This mid-18th century plan of the city of Malaca (Malacca/Melaka) focuses on the military fort (‘A Famosa [The Famous]’), but also includes two churches, a mosque and a Chinese temple. Two markets are also marked, as is the entrance to the port."
title: "Plan de la Ville et forteresse de Malaca : Pour servir à L'Histoire Générale des Voyages. 1750"
